description: Show organization invoices batch PDF file details
permissions: Requires access to the related organization invoices batch via the PDF generation relationship; non-admin users must be in the policy scope for that batch (broker members or manager members of the batch organization), while admins are allowed.
validation_notes: The <id> argument is required. When --include-pdf-body is set and the PDF body exists, the response includes base64-encoded PDF content.

flags.name: --include-pdf-body
flags.description: Include base64 PDF body in the response
flags.validation: If true, response includes base64 PDF body when available.
